text: "Whiskey Under The Bridge" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music duo Brooks & Dunn. It was released in September 1995 as the fifth and final single from their album Waitin' on Sundown. It peaked at number 5 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Kix Brooks, Don Cook and Ronnie Dunn. ==Critical reception== Larry Flick, of Billboard magazine reviewed the song favorably saying that Ronnie Dunn "shines on this well written tune" and that his voice "does equal justice to a heartbreaking weeper of a two-steppin' dance number." Billboard, September 23, 1995 ==Chart positions== "Whiskey Under the Bridge" debuted at number 53 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks for the week of September 23, 1995. {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1995) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !scope="col"|Chart (1995) !scope="col"|Position |- | Canada Country Tracks (RPM) | align="center" | 50 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 singles Category:Brooks & Dunn songs Category:Songs written by Kix Brooks Category:Songs written by Don Cook Category:Songs written by Ronnie Dunn Category:Song recordings produced by Don Cook Category:Song recordings produced by Scott Hendricks Category:Arista Nashville singles Category:1994 songs
title: Whiskey Under the Bridge
